languages.text: "Ого, ты продержался целых пять минут без историй о хрусте костей под пятой закона! Как ты только вытерпел?"

traits.locale_text: "Ого, ты продержался целых пять минут без историй о хрусте костей под пятой закона! Как ты только вытерпел?"

languages.text: "Hey, you've gone five whole minutes without stories about bones crunching under the boot of the Imperial Law! How did you pull that off?"
languages.original_text: "Ого, ты продержался целых пять минут без историй о хрусте костей под пятой закона! Как ты только вытерпел?"

traits.locale_text: "Hey, you've gone five whole minutes without stories about bones crunching under the boot of the Imperial Law! How did you pull that off?"
"Hey, you've gone five whole minutes without stories about bones crunching under the boot of the Imperial Law! How did you pull that off?"
"Hey, you've gone five whole minutes without stories about bones crunching under the boot of the law! How did you pull that off?"
"Hey, you've gone five whole minutes without stories about bones crunching under the boot of the law! How did you pull that off?"
"Hey, you've gone five whole minutes without stories about bones crunching under the boot of the Imperial Law! How did you pull that off?"
"Hey, you've gone five whole minutes without stories about bones crunching under the boot of the Imperial Law! How did you pull that off?"

languages.text: 「おや、帝国の法のブーツの下で骨が砕ける話をせずに、丸々5分も過ごせたじゃないか！どうやって我慢したんだ？」
languages.original_text: "Hey, you've gone five whole minutes without stories about bones crunching under the boot of the Imperial Law! How did you pull that off?"

traits.locale_text: 「おや、法のブーツの下で骨が砕ける話をせずに、丸々5分も過ごせたじゃないか！どうやって我慢したんだ？」
「おや、法のブーツの下で骨が砕ける話をせずに、丸々5分も過ごせたじゃないか！どうやって我慢したんだ？」

languages.text: "Hey, Ihr habt schon seit bestimmt fünf Minuten keine Geschichten erzählt, wie Knochen unter den Stiefeln des Imperialen Gesetzes knacken! Wie habt Ihr das denn bewerkstelligt?"
languages.original_text: "Hey, you've gone five whole minutes without stories about bones crunching under the boot of the Imperial Law! How did you pull that off?"

traits.locale_text: "Hey, Ihr habt schon seit bestimmt fünf Minuten keine Geschichten erzählt, wie Knochen unter den Stiefeln des Imperialen Gesetzes knacken! Wie habt Ihr das denn bewerkstelligt?"

languages.text: « Ça alors, ça faisait au moins cinq minutes que vous ne nous aviez pas raconté d'histoire d'os écrasés sous la botte de la loi ! Comment vous avez fait pour tenir aussi longtemps ? »
languages.original_text: "Hey, you've gone five whole minutes without stories about bones crunching under the boot of the Imperial Law! How did you pull that off?"

traits.locale_text: « Ça alors, ça faisait au moins cinq minutes que vous ne nous aviez pas raconté d'histoire d'os écrasés sous la botte de la loi ! Comment vous avez fait pour tenir aussi longtemps ? »
« Ça alors, ça faisait au moins cinq minutes que vous ne nous aviez pas raconté d'histoire d'os écrasés sous la botte de la loi ! Comment vous avez fait pour tenir aussi longtemps ? »

languages.text: «¡Anda, ha logrado pasar cinco minutos enteros sin contar cómo crujen los huesos bajo la pesada bota de la ley imperial! ¿Cómo lo ha hecho?».
languages.original_text: "Hey, you've gone five whole minutes without stories about bones crunching under the boot of the Imperial Law! How did you pull that off?"

traits.locale_text: «¡Anda, ha logrado pasar cinco minutos enteros sin contar cómo crujen los huesos bajo la pesada bota de la ley imperial! ¿Cómo lo ha hecho?».

languages.text: “嘿，你已经整整五分钟没说什么‘罪人的尸骨在法律的铁蹄下嘎吱作响’之类的话了！你究竟是怎么做到的？”
languages.original_text: "Hey, you've gone five whole minutes without stories about bones crunching under the boot of the Imperial Law! How did you pull that off?"

traits.locale_text: “嘿，你已经整整五分钟没说什么‘罪人的尸骨在法律的铁蹄下嘎吱作响’之类的话了！你究竟是怎么做到的？”
“嘿，你已经整整五分钟没说什么‘罪人的尸骨在法律的铁蹄下嘎吱作响’之类的话了！你究竟是怎么做到的？”

languages.text: "İmparatorluk Yasası altında ezilen kemikleri anlatmadan beş dakika dayanmayı başardın! Nasıl olur?"
languages.original_text: "Hey, you've gone five whole minutes without stories about bones crunching under the boot of the Imperial Law! How did you pull that off?"

traits.locale_text: "İmparatorluk Yasası altında ezilen kemikleri anlatmadan beş dakika dayanmayı başardın! Nasıl olur?"

languages.original_text: "Hey, you've gone five whole minutes without stories about bones crunching under the boot of the Imperial Law! How did you pull that off?"
